description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Are you a musician seeking to improve your chops or a beginner wanting to learn? Yaystuff brings you an accurate rhythm keeping device with an HD finish! You might already own a metronome, but imagine the accuracy if it harnessed the processing power of the Xbox 360! And if you're like us then you always misplace your pocket sized metronome, but that probably won't be a problem with Metronome HD!
